title: My Jungle
description: A silly story from an eight-year-old boy's point of view and his experiences with his mom awaits you. Young readers will delight in the comical answers to why he refuses to clean his room. The answers may not be what she wants to hear, but they are hilarious. For every action, there is a reaction. How far is this young boy willing to go?
author: S.L. Sidelinger
